name: fibonacci-kotlin Dev Container
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p .vscode && cp /workspaces/fibonacci-kotlin/.devcontainer/vscode/settings.json .vscode/ && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget unzip && wget https://download.jetbrains.com/kotlin/compiler/kotlin-compiler-1.9.10.zip -O /tmp/kotlin-compiler.zip && unzip /tmp/kotlin-compiler.zip -d /opt/kotlin && rm /tmp/kotlin-compiler.zip
